alert.note: Alert for Block Island; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A few strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Washington County through 230 PM EDT... At 128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montauk Point, or 12 miles southwest of Block Island, moving north at 40 mph. Another thunderstorm was over Block Island. Locally heavy downpours may produce one-half to one inch of rain. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... South Kingstown, Block Island, Westerly, Hopkinton, Charlestown, Richmond and Exeter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
